version.title: Version
version.description: Service version - changing the version of a service is interned to indicate a measurable change in the service itself such as but not restricted to changes of equipment, personnel, methodology, data processing, etc.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A brief description of a specific technical or access service offered, such as the use of X to investigate Y

description.title: Description
description.description: A longer description of a specific technical or access service offered within the IPERION-HS project or under E-RIHS

service_techniques.title: Service techniques
service_techniques.description: A list of the individual relevant heritage science examination and analytical techniques carried out within this Service - selected from a publicly defined controlled list.

service_categories.title: Service categories
service_categories.description: An externally defined service top level categories defining what types of work the included techniques are used to carry out - selected from a publicly defined controlled list.

data_management_plan.title: Data management plan
data_management_plan.description: Link to an open description of the data management procedures followed with the defined service, including licence issues, preferred data repositories, publication embargoes, common file formats, software and systems used, etc.

resources.title: Objects, samples and archives
resources.description: Service resources should be defined by PIDs and represent the heritage collections, objects, samples, archives, other research resources directly provided by the service.

equipment.title: Service equipment
equipment.description: Service equipment should be defined by PIDs and represent the actual individual pieces of equipment used within the service - detail of setup, methodology, procedures, etc. should all be attached directly to the equipment records.

creation_date.title: Service creation date
creation_date.description: The creation date is the date from which this particular Service was offered in a formal capacity by the defined Access provider.

version_date.title: Service version date
version_date.description: The version date is the date from which this particular version of this Service was offered in a formal capacity by the defined Access provider.
